name: PyCharm Professional
description:
PyCharm Professional is a Python IDE. Code debugging, syntax highlighting, Project management, jump-to-code, smart hint, auto-completion, unit testing, version controlling and other functions are available. And it supports Google App Engine and IronPython.
You need to get a licence to use this software after the evaluation period.

zh_CN.description:
PyCharm Professional是一个Python集成开发环境，它具有代码调试、语法高亮、Project管理、代码跳转、智能提示、自动完成、单元测试、版本控制等功能，同时支持Google App Engine和IronPython。
该版本需要您自行购买长期使用授权。
zh_CN.name: PyCharm Professional
